DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine effect different dos caffeine intraocular pressure . We hypothesize high dosage caffeine would increase intraocular pressure lower dos . Eligible subject randomize three group : 1. group 1 : intake decaffeinate coffee 2. group 2 : intake coffee low caffeine dose 3. group 3 : intake coffee high caffeine dose Intraocular pressure measure 0 , 30 , 60 90 minute coffee intake .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dosage Caffeine Intraocular Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: decaffeinate coffee contain 0.5-2 mg caffeine regular dose coffee contain 91.8 mg caffeine high dose coffee contain 144 mg caffeine three group ' intraocular pressure measure Goldmann applanation tonometer 4 timepoints : 1 . 0 minute ( baseline ) 2 . 30 minute intake 3 . 60 minute intake 4 . 90 minute intake
DOC.criteria: healthy subject normal central corneal thickness normal baseline intraocular pressure ocular disease baseline intraocular pressure 21 mmHg central corneal thickness le 520 micron 540 micron
